card.name: Bearer of Golden Harvests
card.text: When this creature enters, you may exile target Aura card from your graveyard. If you do, cast a copy of it without paying its mana cost if that spell targets a land. Enchanted lands you control have hexproof and indestructible.

card.name: Blessed Aegis
card.text: Flash Enchant creature When this enchantment enters, prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature this turn. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

card.name: Bloodclaimant's Skill
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Brick by Brick
card.text: Enchant land When this enchantment enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order. Enchanted land has "{2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice an Aura attached to this land: You gain 3 life."

card.name: Conqueror's Hymn
card.text: When this enchantment enters, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with vigilance. {1}{W}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with vigilance.

card.name: Determined Return
card.text: You may put a planeswalker card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, gains "If this planeswalker entered this turn, you may activate its loyalty abilities any time you could cast an instant" until end of turn.

card.name: Great Archives Codifier
card.text: When this creature enters, scry X, where X is the number of permanents in your empire. If you have a whole empire, draw a card. (Your empire consists of up to one each of artifact, creature and enchantment.)

card.name: Guardian of Sannuria
card.text: Flying, vigilance, defender As long as you have a whole empire, this creature can attack as though it didn't have defender. (Your empire consists of up to one each of artifact, creature and enchantment.)

card.name: Hannaru, the Lion Queen
card.text: Indestructible Hannaru can't attack or block unless there are four or more +1/+1 counters among creatures you control. Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature. It gains first strike until end of turn. Incarnate {1}{W}

card.name: Hannaru's Charm
card.text: Choose one — • You gain 7 life. • Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with vigilance. • Exile up to two target creatures you control, then return them to the battlefield under their owner's control.

card.name: Hannaru's Effulgence
card.text: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent's activated abilities can't be activated. If it's a creature, it can't attack or block. Whenever you attack with a creature with power greater than its base power, exile enchanted permanent.

card.name: Harshapal Speardrover
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever this creature attacks, if its power is greater than its base power, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Heartland Croptender

card.name: Imperator's Custodian
card.text: When this creature enters, you may search your library for a Lammasu card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top. Whenever a Lammasu you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Imperial Claim
card.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment. Its controller creates a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Inishtu's Attendant
card.text: When this creature enters, you may exile another target artifact, creature or enchantment you control. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Whenever a nonland, nontoken permanent enters under your control, if it wasn't cast, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.text: When this creature enters, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

card.name: Khulnarah Orator
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, if it has power greater than its base power, it gains lifelink until end of turn. {4}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.text: You can't cast this spell unless an artifact or enchantment entered under your control this turn. Flying
